Reviews.Content: begin stayed nights paid 180 money casino closed pool pathetic closes 6pm hot tub advertised disgusting walked immediately noticed disgusting smell defrosted mini fridge left wet towel dangling smelled mildew smells afraid walk carpet fear catching disease kept flip flops whenever walking shower inexplicable leak bathroom everytime sink shower puddle floor bed hard rock slider door onto patio didnt close properly couldnt lock noise street blocked closing slider louder curtains holes couldnt try block sun security deposit 25 cash ridiculous worse buy candle wouldnt vomit whenever walked oh hole ceiling leading pipes rattled horribly loud whenever ac internet advertised hope didnt forget bottom line stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “NASTY PALACE!”

Reviews.Content: traveling seen hotel bad terrible service match beautiful puerto rico times absolutely wonderful review specifically directed dis service provided manager diamond palace please correct im crazy check wife 6 month daughter supposed lengthy stay enter absolutely filthy wasnt 5 star hotel rediculous im talking throw carpet unknown stains bed sheets toilet flown etc etc stairs front desk kindly tell figueroa calls whom expressed changed clean roomwe didnt refund upgrade else matter clean response cant guarantee cant guarantee beds view looks cleanliness excuse hospitality business offer basic clean standard send upstairs whats call wrong business truly fired im 1st contact whoever owner please action sake own business reputation strongly suggest puerto rico tourism board look closing specially surrounded beautiful resorts people caught middle nasty palace

Reviews.Content: worse buisness dont casino available besides didnt stay night left 1st night manager available called 4 days straight manage available dirty hole sliding doors getting tv held strap mold bathroom wooden board mattress mildew smell resturant closed pool dirty putting danger finally manager explained appealed charges money time ill actual hotel

Reviews.Title: “Run away as fast as you can from this hotel!”

Reviews.Content: totally agreed bad reviews hotel travel agent booked hotel rate cdn dollars par night prior cruise didnt step carpet barefooted sit chairs bathroom ceiling leaking husband repairman broken shower handle hole exposed pipes closet ceiling granted look straight hanging clothes read bed 700pm requested 430 am 700am flight fortunately noisy street guests didnt allow sleep checking soundly asleep instead moral story dont count yourself

Reviews.Title: “we called the elevator sparky!!--we had fun...”

Reviews.Content: read review written toothe elevator girl hard fancy top towerthe night ceiling leaking ac trash catch maid service excellent view 411 amazingand break little drinks time watching craziness street fort el morro short taxi ride awayi highly recomend itand beach close diamond palace isle cab ride welland worth itthe rain forest trip available street pretty short money 60 dollars nice marriot casino ambassador road nice casino upstairs restaraunt real drink casinos puerto rico bar expensive overall diamond palace served time stay else time ps cab drivers entertaining enjoy trip

Reviews.Title: “Run away”
Reviews.Author: dischick
Reviews.Content: despite orignally booked stay marriott san juan cruise coordinator recommended 50 varying ages including children stay diamond palace rate wasnt lobby clean story 1 toilets strip paper indicating cleaned closer inspection found pubic hair sort slimy gunk seat 2 literally sweating condensation walls 3 children woke sort insect ear 4 outdated bit odd smell granted 2007 hopefully changed reading recent reviews hasnt thank goodness stay night
